00054 template<typename T> class KviPointerList;
00055 template<typename T> class KviPointerListIterator;

00057 #ifndef NULL
00058         #define NULL 0

00065 class KviPointerListNode
00066 {
00067 public:
00068         KviPointerListNode * m_pPrev;
00069         void               * m_pData;
00070         KviPointerListNode * m_pNext;
00071 };

00143 template<typename T> class KviPointerListIterator
00144 {
00145 protected:
00146         KviPointerList<T>                 * m_pList;
00147         KviPointerListNode                * m_pNode;
00148 public:
00156         KviPointerListIterator(const KviPointerListIterator<T> & src)
00157         {
00158                 m_pList = src.m_pList;
00159                 m_pNode = src.m_pNode;
00160         }
00161 
00169         KviPointerListIterator(KviPointerList<T> & l)
00170         {
00171                 m_pList = (KviPointerList<T> *)&l;
00172                 m_pNode = m_pList->m_pHead;
00173         }
00174 
00183         KviPointerListIterator(KviPointerList<T> & l,KviPointerListNode * pNode)
00184         {
00185                 m_pList = (KviPointerList<T> *)&l;
00186                 m_pNode = pNode;
00187         }
00188 
00196         void operator = (const KviPointerListIterator<T> & src)
00197         {
00198                 m_pList = src.m_pList;
00199                 m_pNode = src.m_pNode;
00200         }
00201 public:
00208         bool moveFirst()
00209         {
00210                 m_pNode = m_pList->m_pHead;
00211                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00212         }
00213 
00220         bool moveLast()
00221         {
00222                 m_pNode = m_pList->m_pTail;
00223                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00224         }
00225 
00233         bool moveNext()
00234         {
00235                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00236                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pNext;
00237                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00238         }
00239 
00248         bool operator ++()
00249         {
00250                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00251                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pNext;
00252                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00253         }
00254 
00263         bool movePrev()
00264         {
00265                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00266                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pPrev;
00267                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00268         }
00269 
00279         bool operator --()
00280         {
00281                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00282                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pPrev;
00283                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00284         }
00285 
00292         T * current()
00293         {
00294                 return m_pNode ? (T *)(m_pNode->m_pData) : NULL;
00295         }
00296 
00304         T * operator *()
00305         {
00306                 return m_pNode ? (T *)(m_pNode->m_pData) : NULL;
00307         }
00308 
00315         bool isValid()
00316         {
00317                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00318         }
00319 };

00365 template<typename T> class KviPointerList
00366 {
00367         friend class KviPointerListIterator<T>;
00368 protected:
00369         bool   m_bAutoDelete;   //< do we automatically delete items when they are removed ?
00370 
00371         KviPointerListNode * m_pHead;         //< our list head pointer (NULL if there are no items in the list)
00372         KviPointerListNode * m_pTail;         //< our list tail
00373         KviPointerListNode * m_pAux;          //< our iteration pointer
00374 
00375         unsigned int m_uCount;  //< the count of items in the list
00376 protected:
00387         void insertBeforeSafe(KviPointerListNode * ref, const T * d)
00388         {
00389                 m_pAux = ref;
00390                 KviPointerListNode * n = new KviPointerListNode;
00391                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00392                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux;
00393                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
00394                 {
00395                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = n;
00396                 } else {
00397                         m_pHead = n;
00398                 }
00399                 m_pAux->m_pPrev = n;
00400                 n->m_pData = (void *)d;
00401                 m_uCount++;
00402         }
00403 
00409         void grabFirstAndPrepend(KviPointerList<T> * src)
00410         {
00411                 KviPointerListNode * pNewHead = src->m_pHead;
00412                 if(!pNewHead)
00413                         return;
00414 
00415                 if(pNewHead->m_pNext)
00416                 {
00417                         src->m_pHead = pNewHead->m_pNext;
00418                         src->m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00419                 } else {
00420                         src->m_pHead = NULL;
00421                         src->m_pTail = NULL;
00422                 }
00423 
00424                 if(m_pHead)
00425                 {
00426                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = pNewHead;
00427                         pNewHead->m_pNext = m_pHead;
00428                         m_pHead = pNewHead;
00429                 } else {
00430                         m_pHead = pNewHead;
00431                         m_pTail = pNewHead;
00432                         m_pHead->m_pNext = NULL;
00433                 }
00434                 m_uCount++;
00435                 src->m_uCount--;
00436         }
00437 
00442         void removeCurrentSafe()
00443         {
00444                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
00445                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00446                 else
00447                         m_pHead = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00448                 if(m_pAux->m_pNext)
00449                         m_pAux->m_pNext->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00450                 else
00451                         m_pTail = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00452                 const T * pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00453                 delete m_pAux;
00454                 m_pAux = NULL;
00455                 m_uCount--;
00456                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00457                         delete pAuxData; // this can cause recursion, so do it at the end
00458         }
00459 
00460 public:
00469         void merge(KviPointerList<T> * src)
00470         {
00471                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
00472                 KviPointerListNode * n = src->m_pHead;
00473                 m_uCount += src->m_uCount;
00474                 while(m_pAux && n)
00475                 {
00476                         if(kvi_compare((const T *)(m_pAux->m_pData),(const T *)(n->m_pData)) > 0)
00477                         {
00478                                 // our element is greater, n->m_pData goes first
00479                                 KviPointerListNode * pNext = n->m_pNext;
00480                                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev; // his prev becomes
00481                                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux;
00482                                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
00483                                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = n;
00484                                 else
00485                                         m_pHead = n;
00486                                 m_pAux->m_pPrev = n;
00487                                 n = pNext;
00488                         } else {
00489                                 // that element is greater
00490                                 m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00491                         }
00492                 }
00493                 if(n)
00494                 {
00495                         // last items to append
00496                         if(m_pTail)
00497                         {
00498                                 m_pTail->m_pNext = n;
00499                                 n->m_pPrev = m_pTail;
00500                         } else {
00501                                 m_pHead = n;
00502                                 m_pTail = n;
00503                                 n->m_pPrev = NULL;
00504                         }
00505                         m_pTail = src->m_pTail;
00506                 }
00507 
00508                 src->m_pHead = NULL;
00509                 src->m_pTail = NULL;
00510                 src->m_uCount = 0;
00511         }
00512 
00518         void swap(KviPointerList<T> * src)
00519         {
00520                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
00521                 m_pHead = src->m_pHead;
00522                 src->m_pHead = n;
00523                 n = m_pTail;
00524                 m_pTail = src->m_pTail;
00525                 src->m_pTail = n;
00526                 unsigned int uCount = m_uCount;
00527                 m_uCount = src->m_uCount;
00528                 src->m_uCount = uCount;
00529         }
00530 
00531 
00541         void sort()
00542         {
00543                 if(m_uCount < 2)return;
00544 
00545                 KviPointerList<T> carry;
00546                 KviPointerList<T> tmp[64];
00547                 KviPointerList * fill = &tmp[0];
00548                 KviPointerList * counter;
00549 
00550                 do {
00551                         carry.grabFirstAndPrepend(this);
00552 
00553                         for(counter = &tmp[0];counter != fill && !counter->isEmpty();++counter)
00554                         {
00555                                 counter->merge(&carry);
00556                                 carry.swap(counter);
00557                         }
00558                         carry.swap(counter);
00559                         if(counter == fill)
00560                                 ++fill;
00561                 } while(m_uCount > 0);
00562 
00563                 for(counter = &tmp[1];counter != fill;++counter)
00564                         counter->merge(counter-1);
00565                 swap(fill-1);
00566         }
00567 
00579         void inSort(T * t)
00580         {
00581                 KviPointerListNode * x = m_pHead;
00582                 while(x && (kvi_compare(((T *)x->m_pData),t) > 0))x = x->m_pNext;
00583                 if(!x)append(t);
00584                 else insertBeforeSafe(x,t);
00585         }
00586 
00591         bool isEmpty() const
00592         {
00593                 return (m_pHead == NULL);
00594         }
00595 
00600         unsigned int count() const
00601         {
00602                 return m_uCount;
00603         }
00604 
00612         T * first()
00613         {
00614                 if(!m_pHead)
00615                 {
00616                         m_pAux = NULL;
00617                         return NULL;
00618                 }
00619                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
00620                 return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00621         }
00622 
00630         T * takeFirst()
00631         {
00632                 if(!m_pHead)return NULL;
00633                 T * pData = (T *)m_pHead->m_pData;
00634                 if(m_pHead->m_pNext)
00635                 {
00636                         m_pHead = m_pHead->m_pNext;
00637                         delete m_pHead->m_pPrev;
00638                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00639                 } else {
00640                         delete m_pHead;
00641                         m_pHead = NULL;
00642                         m_pTail = NULL;
00643                 }
00644                 m_uCount--;
00645                 return pData;
00646         }
00647 
00652         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtFirst()
00653         {
00654                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,m_pHead);
00655         }
00656 
00664         T * last()
00665         {
00666                 if(!m_pTail)
00667                 {
00668                         m_pAux = NULL;
00669                         return NULL;
00670                 }
00671                 m_pAux = m_pTail;
00672                 return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00673         }
00674 
00679         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtLast()
00680         {
00681                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,m_pTail);
00682         }
00683 
00691         T * current()
00692         {
00693                 return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00694         }
00695 
00705         T * safeCurrent()
00706         {
00707                 return m_pAux ? (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData) : NULL;
00708         }
00709 
00717         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtCurrent()
00718         {
00719                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,m_pAux);
00720         }
00721 
00731         T * next()
00732         {
00733                 if(!m_pAux)return NULL;
00734                 m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00735                 if(m_pAux)return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00736                 return NULL;
00737         }
00738 
00749         T * prev()
00750         {
00751                 if(!m_pAux)return NULL;
00752                 m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00753                 if(m_pAux)return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00754                 return NULL;
00755         }
00756 
00765         T * at(int idx)
00766         {
00767                 T * t = first();
00768                 int cnt = 0;
00769                 while(t)
00770                 {
00771                         if(idx == cnt)return t;
00772                         t = next();
00773                         cnt++;
00774                 }
00775                 return 0;
00776         }
00777 
00783         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAt(int idx)
00784         {
00785                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
00786                 int cnt = 0;
00787                 while(n)
00788                 {
00789                         if(idx == cnt)
00790                                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,n);
00791                         n = n->m_pNext;
00792                         cnt++;
00793                 }
00794                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,NULL);
00795         }
00796 
00806         int findRef(const T * d)
00807         {
00808                 int ret = 0;
00809                 for(T * t = first();t;t = next())
00810                 {
00811                         if(t == d)return ret;
00812                         ret++;
00813                 }
00814                 return -1;
00815         }
00816 
00822         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtRef(const T * d)
00823         {
00824                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
00825                 while(n)
00826                 {
00827                         if(n->m_pData == d)
00828                                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,n);
00829                         n = n->m_pNext;
00830                 }
00831                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,NULL);
00832         }
00833 
00839         void append(const T * d)
00840         {
00841                 if(!m_pHead)
00842                 {
00843                         m_pHead = new KviPointerListNode;
00844                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00845                         m_pHead->m_pNext = NULL;
00846                         m_pHead->m_pData = (void *)d;
00847                         m_pTail = m_pHead;
00848                 } else {
00849                         m_pTail->m_pNext = new KviPointerListNode;
00850                         m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pPrev = m_pTail;
00851                         m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pNext = NULL;
00852                         m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pData = (void *)d;
00853                         m_pTail = m_pTail->m_pNext;
00854                 }
00855                 m_uCount++;
00856         }
00857 
00863         void append(KviPointerList<T> * l)
00864         {
00865                 for(T * t = l->first();t;t = l->next())append(t);
00866         }
00867 
00873         void prepend(KviPointerList<T> * l)
00874         {
00875                 for(T * t = l->last();t;t = l->prev())prepend(t);
00876         }
00877 
00883         void prepend(const T * d)
00884         {
00885                 if(!m_pHead)
00886                 {
00887                         m_pHead = new KviPointerListNode;
00888                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00889                         m_pHead->m_pNext = NULL;
00890                         m_pHead->m_pData = (void *)d;
00891                         m_pTail = m_pHead;
00892                 } else {
00893                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = new KviPointerListNode;
00894                         m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pNext = m_pHead;
00895                         m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pPrev = NULL;
00896                         m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pData = (void *)d;
00897                         m_pHead =  m_pHead->m_pPrev;
00898                         m_uCount++;
00899                 }
00900         }
00901 
00914         void insert(int iIndex, const T * d)
00915         {
00916                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
00917                 while(m_pAux && iIndex > 0)
00918                 {
00919                         iIndex--;
00920                         m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00921                 }
00922                 if(m_pAux)
00923                         insertBeforeSafe(m_pAux,d);
00924                 else
00925                         append(d);
00926         }
00927 
00934         bool removeFirst()
00935         {
00936                 if(!m_pHead)return false;
00937                 const T * pAuxData;
00938                 if(m_pHead->m_pNext)
00939                 {
00940                         m_pHead = m_pHead->m_pNext;
00941                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pData);
00942                         delete m_pHead->m_pPrev;
00943                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00944                 } else {
00945                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pHead->m_pData);
00946                         delete m_pHead;
00947                         m_pHead = NULL;
00948                         m_pTail = NULL;
00949                 }
00950                 m_pAux = NULL;
00951                 m_uCount--;
00952                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00953                         delete pAuxData;
00954                 return true;
00955         }
00956 
00963         bool removeLast()
00964         {
00965                 if(!m_pTail)return false;
00966                 const T * pAuxData;
00967                 if(m_pTail->m_pPrev)
00968                 {
00969                         m_pTail = m_pTail->m_pPrev;
00970                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pData);
00971                         delete m_pTail->m_pNext;
00972                         m_pTail->m_pNext = NULL;
00973                 } else {
00974                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pTail->m_pData);
00975                         delete m_pTail;
00976                         m_pHead = NULL;
00977                         m_pTail = NULL;
00978                 }
00979                 m_pAux = NULL;
00980                 m_uCount--;
00981                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00982                         delete pAuxData;
00983                 return true;
00984         }
00985 
00994         bool remove(int iIndex)
00995         {
00996                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
00997                 while(m_pAux && iIndex > 0)
00998                 {
00999                         iIndex--;
01000                         m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
01001                 }
01002                 if(!m_pAux)
01003                         return false;
01004                 removeCurrentSafe();
01005                 return true;
01006         }
01007 
01017         void setAutoDelete(bool bAutoDelete)
01018         {
01019                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
01020         }
01021 
01026         bool autoDelete()
01027         {
01028                 return m_bAutoDelete;
01029         };
01030 
01037         void clear()
01038         {
01039                 while(m_pHead)removeFirst();
01040         }
01041 
01049         bool removeCurrent()
01050         {
01051                 if(!m_pAux)
01052                         return false;
01053                 removeCurrentSafe();
01054                 return true;
01055         }
01056 
01065         bool removeRef(const T * d)
01066         {
01067                 if(findRef(d) == -1)return false;
01068                 removeCurrentSafe();
01069                 return true;
01070         }
01071 
01082         void insertAfter(const T * ref, const T * d)
01083         {
01084                 if(findRef(ref) == -1)
01085                 {
01086                         append(d);
01087                         return;
01088                 }
01089                 KviPointerListNode * n = new KviPointerListNode;
01090                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux;
01091                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux->m_pNext;
01092                 if(m_pAux->m_pNext)
01093                         m_pAux->m_pNext->m_pPrev = n;
01094                 else
01095                         m_pTail = n;
01096                 m_pAux->m_pNext = n;
01097                 n->m_pData = (void *)d;
01098                 m_uCount++;
01099         }
01100 
01112         void insertBefore(const T * ref, const T * d)
01113         {
01114                 if(findRef(ref) == -1)
01115                 {
01116                         prepend(d);
01117                         return;
01118                 }
01119                 KviPointerListNode * n = new KviPointerListNode;
01120                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
01121                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux;
01122                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
01123                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = n;
01124                 else
01125                         m_pHead = n;
01126                 m_pAux->m_pPrev = n;
01127                 n->m_pData = (void *)d;
01128                 m_uCount++;
01129         }
01130 
01135         void invert()
01136         {
01137                 if(!m_pHead)return;
01138                 KviPointerListNode * oldHead = m_pHead;
01139                 KviPointerListNode * oldTail = m_pTail;
01140                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
01141                 while(n)
01142                 {
01143                         KviPointerListNode * next = n->m_pNext;
01144                         n->m_pNext = n->m_pPrev;
01145                         n->m_pPrev = next;
01146                         n = next;
01147                 }
01148                 m_pTail = oldHead;
01149                 m_pHead = oldTail;
01150         }
01151 
01157         void copyFrom(KviPointerList<T> * l)
01158         {
01159                 clear();
01160                 for(T * t = l->first();t;t = l->next())append(t);
01161         }
01162 
01170         KviPointerList<T> & operator = (KviPointerList<T> & l)
01171         {
01172                 copyFrom(&l);
01173                 return *this;
01174         }
01175 
01181         KviPointerList<T>(bool bAutoDelete = true)
01182         {
01183                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
01184                 m_pHead = NULL;
01185                 m_pTail = NULL;
01186                 m_uCount = 0;
01187                 m_pAux  = NULL;
01188         };
01189 
01195         virtual ~KviPointerList<T>()
01196         {
01197                 clear();
01198         };
01199 };
